icp_base_frr_icp_01.name: Incident Reporting to FedRAMP
icp_base_frr_icp_01.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_01.instructions: Providers MUST responsibly report _incidents_ to FedRAMP within 1 hour of identification by sending an email to fedramp_security@fedramp.gov or fedramp_security@gsa.gov.

icp_base_frr_icp_02.name: Incident Reporting to Agencies
icp_base_frr_icp_02.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_02.instructions: Providers MUST responsibly report _incidents_ to all _agency_ customers within 1 hour of identification using the _incident_ communications points of contact provided by each _agency_ customer.

icp_base_frr_icp_03.name: Incident Reporting to CISA
icp_base_frr_icp_03.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_03.instructions: Providers MUST responsibly report _incidents_ to CISA within 1 hour of identification if the incident is confirmed or suspected to be the result of an attack vector listed at https://www.cisa.gov/federal-incident-notification-guidelines#attack-vectors-taxonomy, following the CISA Federal Incident Notification Guidelines at https://www.cisa.gov/federal-incident-notification-guidelines, by using the CISA Incident Reporting System at https://myservices.cisa.gov/irf.

icp_base_frr_icp_04.name: Incident Updates
icp_base_frr_icp_04.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_04.instructions: Providers MUST update _all necessary parties_, including at least FedRAMP, CISA (if applicable), and all _agency_ customers, at least once per calendar day until the _incident_ is resolved and recovery is complete.

icp_base_frr_icp_05.name: Incident Report Availability
icp_base_frr_icp_05.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_05.instructions: Providers MUST make _incident_ report information available in their secure FedRAMP repository (such as USDA Connect) or _trust center_.

icp_base_frr_icp_06.name: Responsible Disclosure
icp_base_frr_icp_06.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_06.instructions: Providers MUST NOT irresponsibly disclose specific sensitive information about _incidents_ that would _likely_ increase the impact of the _incident_, but MUST disclose sufficient information for informed risk-based decision-making to _all necessary parties_.

icp_base_frr_icp_07.name: Final Incident Report
icp_base_frr_icp_07.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High

icp_base_frr_icp_08.name: Automated Reporting
icp_base_frr_icp_08.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_08.instructions: Providers SHOULD use automated mechanisms for reporting incidents and providing updates to all necessary parties (including CISA).

icp_base_frr_icp_09.name: Human-Readable and Machine-Readable Formats
icp_base_frr_icp_09.description: FedRAMP ICP > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate, High
icp_base_frr_icp_09.instructions: Providers SHOULD make _incident_ report information available in consistent human-readable and _machine-readable_ formats.
